about.introText:
... passionate about web development, combining logic and creativity to build user-focused solutions.

I enjoy learning new technologies like Angular and responsive design to continuously grow.

I tackle challenges analytically and thrive in agile, collaborative teams.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Got a problem to solve?
contact.text1: I’m a frontend developer passionate about clean code, accessibility, and user-centered design. Let’s build something valuable together!
contact.text2: Need a frontend developer? Contact me!
contact.checkbox: I agree to the processing of my data as stated in the
contact.success: Looking forward to talking to you

work.title: My Work
work.description: Explore a selection of my work here – Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

join.title: Join
join.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

pokedex.title: Pokédex
pokedex.description: Based on the PokéAPI, a simple library that provides and catalogues Pokémon information.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: A personal portfolio website built with Angular, showcasing my projects, skills, and experience as a web developer. Designed with a responsive layout and modern UI.

sharky.title: Sharky
sharky.description: "Jump, run, and throw" game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Sharky collect coins and potions to fight against the dangerous Orca.

recommendation.headline: Need a team player?
recommendation.subheadline: What my colleagues say about me

testimonials.name: Max Name
testimonials.quote: Short quote highlighting my soft skills.

testimonials.name: Jana Neuholz
testimonials.quote: Jana not only demonstrates great team spirit, but also impresses with her structured and solution-oriented way to work. Even in stressful situations, she always stays focused on what really matters. Her positive attitude and professionalism make her a true asset to any team.

testimonials.name: Simon Heistermann
testimonials.quote: Jana works in a structured, reliable, and thoughtful manner. Her calm and clear communication, combined with strong organizational skills, contributed significantly to the progress of our project. Working with her was always pleasant, effective, and above all, successful. I can wholeheartedly recommend Jana!

section1.title: Information pursuant to § 5 of the German Telemedia Act (TMG)
section1.responsible: Responsible for content according to § 5 TMG: Jana Schüler

section2.title: Contact
section2.text: If you have any questions or concerns regarding this website, feel free to contact me via email at:

section3.title: Disclaimer
section3.text: The contents of this website have been created with the greatest possible care. However, I do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of the content. According to § 7 para. 1 TMG, I am responsible for my own content on this website under general law. However, according to §§ 8 to 10 TMG, I am not obliged to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or to investigate circumstances indicating illegal activity.

section4.title: Copyright
section4.text: The content and works created by the site operator on this website are subject to German copyright law. Duplication, editing, distribution, and any kind of use beyond what is permitted under copyright law require the written consent of the author or creator.

section5.title: Privacy Policy
section5.intro: Protecting your personal data is important to me. I treat your personal information confidentially and in accordance with the statutory data protection regulations as well as this privacy policy.
section5.responsibleEntityText:
The responsible entity for data processing on this website is:

Jana [Your Last Name]
[Your Address]
[Email Address]
[Phone Number]
section5.purposeText: When you use the contact form, your name, email address, and message are collected solely for the purpose of responding to your inquiry. This data is not used for marketing or passed on to third parties.
section5.legalBasisText: Data processing is based on your voluntary consent (Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR). You may revoke this consent at any time with future effect by sending a message to the responsible entity.
section5.storageText: Your data will be stored only as long as necessary to process your inquiry and in accordance with legal obligations. Afterwards, it will be securely deleted.
section5.rightsText: You have the right to obtain information about your stored personal data at any time, as well as the right to rectification, deletion, restriction of processing, data portability, and to object to the processing of your data. You may also lodge a complaint with the competent supervisory authority.
section5.sslText: This website uses SSL encryption for security reasons and to protect the transmission of confidential content, such as inquiries via the contact form. You can recognize an encrypted connection in your browser’s address line, which begins with \"https://\".
section5.consentText: By submitting the contact form, you consent to the processing of your personal data (name, email address, and message) for the purpose of responding to your inquiry. This consent is voluntary and can be revoked at any time.
